name: image-metadata-extractor
title: Image Metadata Extractor
description: Extract EXIF data and metadata from photos
content:
Overview

This application extracts EXIF metadata from digital photos, including camera settings, date/time information, GPS coordinates, and more. Built using Pillow and piexif, it provides comprehensive metadata analysis.

Features

  • Extract complete EXIF metadata from photos
  • Display camera make, model, and settings
  • Show capture date and time
  • Extract GPS coordinates if available
  • Export to JSON format for easy parsing

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your photo file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the metadata file

Output

The application generates a JSON file containing all extracted EXIF metadata with the suffix _metadata.json in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Analyzing photo camera settings
  • Extracting GPS location from photos
  • Organizing photos by capture date
  • Verifying image authenticity
  • Digital forensics and investigation
command: rm -rf prod_apps && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python prod_apps/python/image_metadata_extractor.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" --format json
